docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: It's often said that every picture tells a story, but, in fact, so do many objects, especially when similar ones are grouped in an orderly profusion. ''Splash: A History of Swim Wear,'' a sometimes surrealistic exhibition at the Fashion Institute of Technology, deploys just such order and profusion in behalf of that essential modern invention, the swimming suit.

headline.main: Review/Design;   Demure to Demystified, Swimsuits' Hall of Fame
